hedline.hl1: London Theater Guide For the Disabled

abstract.p: Society of London Theater opens www.theater-access.co.uk, online guide to access for disabled at London theaters (S)

block.p: The Society of London Theatre has begun an online guide to access for the disabled at London theaters, www.theatre-access.co.uk. It contains information about wheelchair access, sound amplification systems and admission policy for guide dogs. The guide also lists which performances feature sign-language interpretation and audio descriptions. There is a print version, as well, Access Guide for Disabled Theatergoers, available free in large type, Braille or on tape. Call (44-20) 7557 6751.
